General.Name: Focus Media Information Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Focus Media Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides offline advertising solutions in China. It offers LCD TV, display and poster frame, and movie theater ad network services. The company was formerly known as Hedy Holdings Co., Ltd. Focus Media Information Technology Co., Ltd. founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: Zhaofeng World Trade Building, Shanghai, China, 200050

1.Title: CFO, VP, Sec. of the Board & Vice Chairman
